Articles.Content: <figure data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92" class="tmblr-full"><img data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92" src="https://41.media.tumblr.com/301cb0bc17ca76a396dc75e2651dee4d/tumblr_inline_nragw3n2zZ1rr2wit_540.jpg"/></figure><figure data-orig-width="1191" data-orig-height="670" class="tmblr-full"><img data-orig-width="1191" data-orig-height="670" src="https://41.media.tumblr.com/58316b7bc7e53d003b2c03ced3458fae/tumblr_inline_nragw8PAZU1rr2wit_540.jpg"/></figure><p>Starwhip’s render of Vagani’s ATORV 5 is simply staggering, and the Kerbal is very well done too! </p><p>If this doesn’t inspire you to send a rover out, we don’t know what will.</p>
Well, alrighty then. Thanks for the feature guys!
Wow, that's so amazing that you got fanwords fridays star. And nice render!

What would inspire me?

Give me a *real* rover..... then I'll show ya!

Great render...

0/10 - needs more lensflare.

Just kidding, it's awesome. But why is a car on the Mun?

But why is a car on the Mun?

It's got a black background like that for style, but mainly to hide the fact that there is nothing for a set/landscape besides a flat plane.

I could do better but I think this way looked way cooler.

wow! i just dont have anything else to say!

-jaddbo

It's got a black background like that for style, but mainly to hide the fact that there is nothing for a set/landscape besides a flat plane.

I could do better but I think this way looked way cooler.

Ok, makes sense.
OMG this is awesome! Great to see you featured Vagani and Starwhip!
